# completerDidUpdateResults(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the method when the specified search completer updates its array of search completions.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func completerDidUpdateResults(_ completer: MKLocalSearchCompleter)
```

## Parameters

- **completer**: The search completer object with updated results.

## Discussion

After receiving results from a query, the search completer updates its [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKLocalSearchCompleter/results] property with the new [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKLocalSearchCompletion] objects and calls this method. Use this method to update your app’s interface based on the new search results. For example, you might update a table that you use to display search results to the user.

## Getting the search results

- **completer(_:didFailWithError:)**: Tells the method when the specified search completer is unable to generate a list of search results.
